## IContainer.preloadMetadata() method

Preload metadata for components of a specific type Useful before batch registration of a particular component type

**Signature:**

```typescript
preloadMetadata(type?: ComponentType): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [ComponentType](./koatty_container.componenttype.md) | _(Optional)_ Component type to preload metadata for (optional, if not provided preloads all) |

**Returns:**

void
